name: Timewarp
tagline: SASS + ANGULAR boilerplate for single page applications to speed up your frontend development
body:
# TIME WARP
## A single page web application boilerplate to speed up your frontend development

![](http://i1.ytimg.com/vi/4Mky7-t_nsQ/maxresdefault.jpg)

## SCSS folder
### _core.scss
Is the place where to put variable declarations (colors, spacings, widths) and typography stuff (fonts imports, font variables, etc.). You will also find a ready to use set of useful mixins.

### _layout.wathever.scss
The css architecture is splitted into common breakpoints to help you in responsive development.
You will find a **_layout.common.scss** that includes common styles for all screen sizes then there files for common breakpoints: 1240up for large screens, 1030up for regular desktop screens, 768up for tablets and small laptops, 481up for phablets.

### NOTE
This boilerplate is work in progress
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
